sqlMap.select: SELECT SUM(DECODE(SCH_TY,'01',1,'회계감사',1,0)) as cnt01 ,SUM(DECODE(SCH_TY,'02',1,'세무',1,0)) as cnt02 ,SUM(DECODE(SCH_TY,'03',1,'업무',1,0)) as cnt03 FROM SCHEDULE_CALENDAR WHERE SCH_DT like to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')||#ymd#||'%'

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT SCH_DT AS schDt ,DT_LABEL AS dtLabel ,SCH_TY AS schTy ,SCH_TYNO AS schTyNo ,SUBJECT AS subject ,CONTENTS AS contents ,CNT as cnt FROM SCHEDULE_CALENDAR WHERE SCH_DT like to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')||#ymd#||'%' ) a WHERE 1=1
AND a.schTyNo = #schTy#
order by a.cnt, a.schTy DESC, a.schDt
